content:
I'm glad you're excited! However, I'm a large language model, I don't have personal experiences, so I won't be attending a yoga class or grabbing a snack afterwards. I exist solely to provide information and assist with inquiries.

But I'd be happy to provide you with some healthy post-workout snack and drink recommendations! After a yoga class, it's essential to refuel with nutrient-dense options that help with recovery and replenish energy stores. Here are a few ideas:

**Snacks:**

1. Fresh fruits (e.g., bananas, berries, or citrus)
2. Nuts and seeds (e.g., almonds, cashews, or pumpkin seeds)
3. Energy bars (look for natural ingredients and minimal added sugars)
4. Protein-rich snacks (e.g., hard-boiled eggs, Greek yogurt, or cottage cheese)
5. Veggie sticks with hummus or guacamole

**Drinks:**

1. Water (stay hydrated, especially after a sweaty workout!)
2. Coconut water (electrolyte-rich and refreshing)
3. Herbal tea (e.g., peppermint, chamomile, or ginger)
4. Green smoothies (packed with spinach, avocado, and fruit)
5. Low-sugar sports drinks (if you need a quick energy boost)

Remember to choose options that work for your dietary needs and preferences. Listen to your body and fuel it with what makes you feel good!

Feel free to ask if you have any other questions or need more recommendations. Have a great time at your yoga class, and enjoy your new Lululemon outfit!
